Class naval.Iowa 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----naval.Ship
           |
           +----naval.Iowa
public class Iowa
extends Ship
implements ImageObserver
This battleship is modeled after the USS Wisconsin - an Iowa Class Battleship (assuming each hex is equal to 60m in height).

image
The images of the ship.
img_height
img_width
sea
The sea this ship exists on.

Iowa(Coord, int, Applet, Sea)

draw(Graphics)
getImgInfo()

image 
 Image image[]
The images of the ship. Uses a Coord-style direction as index.
img_width 
 int img_width
img_height 
 int img_height
sea 
 Sea sea
The sea this ship exists on. This variable is necessary to make the ship able to draw itself when the image is actually loaded.
